Mnemonic: A maru (まるい) balloon is round like a circle-shaped kanji.
A "KAgaku" (scientist) carries a test tube (science) and shouts "KA-GA-KU!" in the lab.
Imagine saying "good evening" to the moon: "Konnbanwa! (こんばんは)" as it bows back.
Imagine a car (くるま) cruising down the road, shaped just like the kanji 車.
